channel.title: How can i make it so admins cant be attacked?
channel.description:
When you right click an admin how can i make it not say fight? i made it so they cant attack but i dont know how to make it so people cant attack them
thanks[br][size=1]Posted on: July 24, 2007, 11:32:24 AM[/size][hr]So no one knows?

item.title: How can i make it so admins cant be attacked?
item.dc:creator: @i_own_pking i_own_pking
item.description:
@i_own_pking wrote:

[quote=“The Moose, post:2, topic:126792”]1.Dont double post.
2.What would the point of that be? Admins are like usless standing meat puppets that cant attack or be attacked?[/quote]

its not a pking server and im making it like runescape

the admins on there cant be attacked or traded with

i want it like that admins are only there to sort out bugs and deal with stuff

Read full topic
item.source: How can i make it so admins cant be attacked?
